name: Wee Ki Jie
title: Software Developer
bio: Forward-thinking developer with a passion for AI and Machine Learning, backed by a strong background in enterprise-grade engineering.

experience.title: Programmer Analyst Trainee
description: Supporting a large-scale, highly customized Dynamics 365 implementation for thousands of users, focusing on stability and security.
Resolved complex production issues through reverse-engineering legacy code and remediating VAPT security findings.
Managed releases, hotfixes, and data patches while working closely with IT and business teams to communicate risks and root causes.

experience.title: Mobile Application Developer
description: Developed a mobile app for biometric facial measurement using ML Kit’s Face Detection API to support progressive lens fitting.
Built custom eyeglass detection and tracking models in PyTorch and applied OpenCV for lens contour extraction and optometric metric computation.
Created a real-time AR eyewear virtual try-on web app with Jeeliz VTO and gesture-based interaction via MediaPipe/Handsfree.js, enhanced by secondary-camera hand pose tracking.

education.description: Specialized in software engineering and web development

certifications.name: Git Complete: The definitive, step-by-step guide to Git

competitions.name: TIL-AI Brainhack 2025
competitions.description: Trained an Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) model using Whisper, fine-tuned with a custom dataset and data augmentation techniques for a specific use case. Trained and optimized a reinforcement learning (RL) model for an autonomous robotic car to navigate the environment using a point-based reward system, competing against multiple teams in alternating “hunter” and “hunted” roles.

competitions.name: TIL-AI Brainhack 2024
competitions.description: Trained an Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) model using Whisper, fine-tuned with a custom dataset and data augmentation techniques, and evaluated through competition-style rankings based on accuracy and inference speed.

competitions.name: AWS Build On Singapore 2020
competitions.description: Proposal(Education LMS) accepted for AWS Build On 2020 Hackathon Singapore, focused on solving real-world problems using AWS services. Selected among submitted entries to move forward into development.
